metadata.Title: CVE-2015-4707 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in IPython before 3.2 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via vectors involving JSON error messages and the /api/notebooks path.

notes.Note: tyhicks> It isn't clear if iPython versions less than 2.0 are affected debian> Problematic code introduced in rel-2.0.0

criterions.comment: ipython: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
